name: hbg-budget-app
description: Professional Political Party Accounting System for Homes Before Growth

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.clean: npm run kill:ports && echo 'Cleaned up all development ports'
scripts.kill:ports: pkill -f 'node.*3000\|node.*3005\|next\|nodemon' || echo 'No processes found on development ports'
scripts.check:ports: echo 'Checking ports 3000 and 3005:' && (lsof -i :3000 -i :3005 || echo 'No processes using ports 3000 or 3005')
scripts.restart: npm run clean && sleep 2 && npm run dev

author: Homes Before Growth
